title: Please help me find font
content:
Hello everyone. A very long time looking for this font, could you help me? If anyone knows, please tell me what this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015075501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5736_5795.jpg)
author: monkpwnz

comments.content:
Apparently this logo is used by [http://vk.com/youngbeatzzlessons](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015075501/http:/vk.com/youngbeatzzlessons "http://vk.com/youngbeatzzlessons").  
This appears to be a place where you could ask questions in Russian.  
It is possible only these letters were designed for the logo and not part of a full font.  
Don
The fact that they do not respond to this question. Font same secret, lol.

I suspect they developed the design for their own use & don't want to see it elsewhere.  
But this is simply speculation.  
Don

Fonts play a huge role in branding - of course they deserve protection.

hhp
